content: Can I use clinFHIR to create an Implementation Guide that simply picks a Resource (i.e. Patient), and specifies a subset of the core query parameters that MUST be implemented by compliant servers? --- asking for a friend... IHE...
CapabilityStatement allows you to define what a system is expected to do, including search criteria. (There are extensions to distinguish SHOULD/SHALL/MAY).

I understood CapabilityStatement to be a declaration of what it DOES implement. I want to specify what it is expected to do. Implementation Guide specification, not implementation declaration... Are you saying this is possible? Is there an example?
Haven't done implementation guides in CF yet...
Understood. I expected scenario builder was an IG producing workflow... I suspect it is precursor (business focus) to the technical profiling?
actually the logical modeller is the precursor to producing technical profiles. Works in the simple case, but needs more attention!
